name: trala
tagline: A personal budgeting and finance tracking app
description: Trala is a self-hosted personal finance and budgeting application with transaction tracking, categorization, and summaries, giving individuals a clear overview of their money.

features.title: Transaction Tracking
features.description: Record income and expenses with dates, amounts, categories, and descriptions

features.title: Budget Management
features.description: Set monthly budgets by category and track spending against targets

features.title: Category System
features.description: Organize transactions with customizable categories for detailed financial analysis

features.title: Account Management
features.description: Track multiple accounts like checking, savings, and credit cards separately

features.title: Financial Summaries
features.description: View summaries showing income, expenses, and net worth over time

features.title: Trend Analysis
features.description: Identify spending patterns and trends with charts and visualizations

features.title: Recurring Transactions
features.description: Set up recurring income or expenses that are automatically logged

features.title: Search and Filter
features.description: Find transactions using search and filter by date, category, or amount
